metadata.title: CVE-2024-47601 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: GStreamer is a library for constructing graphs of media-handlingcomponents. A null pointer dereference vulnerability has been discovered inthe gst_matroska_demux_parse_blockgroup_or_simpleblock function withinmatroska-demux.c. This function does not properly check the validity of theGstBuffer *sub pointer before performing dereferences. As a result, nullpointer dereferences may occur. This vulnerability is fixed in 1.24.10.

criterions.comment: gst-plugins-good1.0 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
